| HistoryText             = The Troubleshooters were originally created by [[Philip Nelson Vogt (Earth-616)|Phil Vogt]] on the behalf of the [[National Security Agency (Earth-616)|N.S.A.]] as a unit of monitoring and reconnaissance, a team of agents with the ability to, if necessary, keep tabs on an alpha-level special response group, the likes of the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]] or the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]], without their knowledge.{{r|Ultimates 2 Vol 2 3}}

They were first deployed to monitor the [[Ultimates (Earth-616)|Ultimates]].{{r|Ultimates Vol 3 9}} Following the termination of said team, the Troubleshooters were appointed by the government of the United States to become their covert ops science team.{{r|Ultimates Vol 3 1}}
